ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

The highly anticipated sequel to the 2016 game of the year "Overwatch" was Overwatch 2.
Instead we got Overwatch: Suck My Dick, Blizzard Edition.
Remember when we were supposed to get a free campaign mode? and then instead they decided to do a worse paid campaign like mode :(

I only leave the game running to stare at Tracer, Mercy, Brigitte and Widowmaker's weapons of mass destruction.
There is no PVE, no content, or anything that they promised. I only downloaded it to play with Bots. that's it..

Slippin' Jimmy, is an American animated short-form series and a spin-off of Better Call Saul (itself a spin-off of Breaking Bad). The series follows a young Jimmy McGill's misadventures in Cicero with his best friend Marco Pasternak. The show's release on AMC+ was set to coincide with the release of the final episode of the first half of Better Call Saul's sixth season.
God i hate playing this game. Every time i play this game , i just rage. what a let down after supporting this piece of sht company for so many years.
